sentences.sentence: Egyptians were buried with an ankh, so that they could continue to live in the "afterworld".
sentences.translation: 埃及人与安可一起被葬，这样他们就可以在“来世”继续生活。

sentences.sentence: The ankh is an ancient symbol which was adopted by the hippie movement in the 1960s to represent peace and love.
sentences.translation: 十字标志是一个古老的符号，在20世纪60年代的嬉皮士运动中被用来代表和平和爱。

sentences.sentence: They believed that the ankh could control the flow of the river and make sure that there was always enough water.
sentences.translation: 他们相信十字勋章可以控制河流的流动，确保总是有足够的水。
